title: When is the 10 ban system hitting OCE exactly?
body: So the patch notes mentioned 10 bans coming sometime this patch, but is there an eta on this? Would love to know when exactly its hitting OCE because I'm really keen to play with 10 bans.

replies.body:
Hey everyone just to provide some context. Currently 10 bans testing in NA only (no other region has it) and only in Normal draft in NA. We will be doing testing for a number of days to make sure its all working as intended and there are no big issues (in terms of bugs but also the behaviours that it might create). 

Once testing is done and everything is all good it will begin rolling out globally. Unfortunately I don't have a hard time frame for you there it all depends on how the tests go. Hopefully that provides some clarity on the subject.
Well, that's disappointing as I assumed we were getting it with the patch, but the clarity about this is much appreciated either way. Thanks for the info.

Hey mate,
How will this impact normal games, will OCE be receiving Normal Draft? And if so how would this affect Blind Pick?
Please give us normal drafts in OCE. I'd rather be given a role/lane rather then fight over them in Blind pick.
We wont be getting Normal/Draft as the server population isnt high enough for it to be Viable with reasonable queue times.
yeah id like to know as well. usually this sorta stuff either isnt in the highlights or is turned on as soon as the patch hits?
Yeah its usually turned on as soon as the patch hits. But we've had the patch all day and no news at all.
It's for draft normals, but because OCE is a  neglected server we don't get it.
